title: Language filter wont turn off
body: I have it slected top be off and it wont turn off. I have reinstalled league(not for this reason) and that didn't even change it. I am using the new client.

replies.body: This may be an issue with the updated client not updating setting.  Are you able to change it on the legacy client?  If that's the case, then I suggest posting about this on the[ client discussion ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion)boards for feedback.  Thanks for testing!
